original_text: The next day the crowd that had stayed on the opposite shore of the lake realized that only one boat had been there, and that Jesus had not entered it with his disciples, but that they had gone away alone.
korean_text: 이튿날 바다 건너편에 서 있던 무리가 배 한 척 외에 다른 배가 거기 없는 것과 또 어제 예수께서 제자들과 함께 그 배에 오르지 아니하시고 제자들만 가는 것을 보았더니

sentences.original_text: the crowd that had stayed on the opposite shore
that only one boat had been there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에는 배 한 척만 있었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that Jesus had not entered it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수님은 그 배에 타지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: but that they had gone away alone
